text: modeun ingan-egeneun geuui apgwadwie cheonsadeul-i iss-eo hananim-ui myeong lyeong-eulo geuleul jikyeobogo gyesim-ila sillo hananimkkeseoneun salamdeul-i jeodeul-ui ma-eumsog-e issneun geos-eul bakkugi jeon-eneun jeodeul-ui sangtaeleul byeonhwasikiji ani hasinila hananim-i geu baegseong ege gonan-eul julyeo hasilttaeneun eoneu nugudo mag-anael su eobs-euni hananim oeeneun bohojaga eobsneunila
